npm-confirm.less: It allows you to use less filter and link less files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.clean-css: It allows you to use minify option on CSS files and contents (recommended in production).
npm-confirm.stylus: It allows you to use stylus filter and link stylus files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.coffee-script: It allows you to use coffee-script filter and coffee-script files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.babel-cli: It allows you to use react/jsx filter and react/jsx files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx: It allows you to use react/jsx filter and react/jsx files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.babel-preset-es2015: It allows you to use react/jsx filter and react/jsx files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.babel-preset-react: It allows you to use react/jsx filter and react/jsx files inside minify/concat tags.
npm-confirm.uglify-js: It allows you to use minify option on JS files and contents (recommended in production).
